import me from "./avatar.jpg"; import mycv from "./mycv.pdf"; import "./App.css"; import { myInfo } from "./data"; import Language from "./components/Language"; import Experience from "./components/Experience"; import Item from "./components/Item"; function App() { const { programingLanguage, info, database, experiences, education, certifications, skills, hobbies } = myInfo; return (

{info.name}

{info.major}

Contact {/* Hire Me */}

About Me

{info.description}

Birthday
{info.birthday}
Email
{info.email}
{/*
Phone
{info.phone}
*/}
Address
{info.address}

Programing Language

{programingLanguage.map((item, index) => ( ))}
{database.map((item, index) => ( ))}

Work Experience

{experiences.map((item, index) => ( ))}

Education And Training

{education.school}
{education.time}
{education.major}

Certifications

Skills

Hobbies

); } export default App;
